thread.title: Sir Gerald Kaufman, the Labour MP and Father of The House of Commons, dies aged 86
thread.title_full: Sir Gerald Kaufman, the Labour MP and Father of The House of Commons, dies aged 86

author: Telegraph Reporters
title: Sir Gerald Kaufman, the Labour MP and Father of The House of Commons, dies aged 86
text:
Sir Gerald Kaufman, the Labour MP and Father of The House of Commons, dies aged 86 Sir Gerald Kaufman in 1990 Telegraph Reporters 26 February 2017 â€¢ 11:52pm 
S ir Gerald Kaufman, Labour MP for Manchester Gorton and Father of The House of Commons, has died aged 86, a family spokesman said. 
Labour Party leader Jeremy Corbyn paid tribute to Sir Gerald Kaufman as an "iconic and irascible figure", saying: "He loved life and politics. I will deeply miss him, both for his political commitment and constant friendship." Follow Telegraph News
